Post.title: git.md
Post._content:
### git

****

```java
// 
git branch
// 
git branch -r
// 
git branch -a
```
<!-- More -->

**/**

```java
// dev
git checkout dev
// dev1,dev1
git checkout -b dev1 => git branch dev1 git checkout dev1
// devdev1
git checkout -b dev1 origin/dev
```

****

```java
// dev1 --no-ff
git merge dev1
git merge --no-ff -m "merge with no-ff" dev1
//  rebase
git rebase dev1
```

****

```java
// 
git branch -d dev1
// 
git branch -D dev1
  
// 
git push origin --delete dev
or
git push origin :dev
```

****

```java
//  master  dev dev
git push origin master:dev
// mastermaster
git push origin master => git push origin master:master
```

****

 checkout   (tracking branch) git pull/pushGit /

```java
// 
git branch -u origin/dev master
or
git branch --set-upstream-to origin/dev master
// 
git branch -vv
```

**Tag**

```java
// tag
git tag -a v1.0 -m 'msg'
// tag
git push origin v1.0
```

git push origin <branch> 

git rebase <branch> 

git tag -a <tag> -m 'msg' tag

git push orign <tag>  tag

git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/4.6.0 4.6.0

Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).
<!-- More -->
## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

Post.title: 10Swift
Post._content:
# 

> [10 Swift One Liners To Impress Your Friends](https://www.uraimo.com/2016/01/06/10-Swift-One-Liners-To-Impress-Your-Friends/)



1. 2

   ```swift
   (1...1024).map{ $0 * 2 }
   ```

2. 

   ```swift
   (1...1024).reduce(0, combine: +)
   ```

<!-- More -->

1. 

   filter

   ```swift
   let words = ["Swift","iOS","cocoa","OSX","tvOS"]
   let tweet = "This is an example tweet larking about Swift"
   let valid = !words.filter({tweet.containsString($0)}).isEmpty
   print(valid) // true
   // or
   words.contains(tweet.containsString)
   // or
   tweet.characters.split(" ").lazy.map(String.init).contains(Set(words).contains)
   ```

2. 

   ```swift
   let path = NSBundle.mainBundle().pathForResource("test", ofType: "txt")
   let lines = try? String(contentsOfFile: path!).characters.split{$0 == "\n"}.map(String.init)
   if let lines=lines {
       lines[0] // O! for a Muse of fire, that would ascend
       lines[1] // The brightest heaven of invention!
       lines[2] // A kingdom for a stage, princes to act
       lines[3] // And monarchs to behold the swelling scene.
   }
   ```

3. !

   ```swift
    let name = "uraimo"
    (1...4).forEach{print("Happy Birthday " + (($0 == 3) ? "dear \(name)":"to You"))}
   ```

4. 

   ```swift
    var part3 = [82, 58, 76, 49, 88, 90].reduce( ([],[]), combine: {
        (a:([Int],[Int]),n:Int) -> ([Int],[Int]) in
        (n<60) ? (a.0+[n],a.1) : (a.0,a.1+[n])
    })
    print(part3) // ([58, 49], [82, 76, 88, 90])
   ```

5. XML Web

   ```swift
    let xmlDoc = try? AEXMLDocument(xmlData: NSData(contentsOfURL: NSURL(string:"https://www.ibiblio.org/xml/examples/shakespeare/hen_v.xml")!)!)
    if let xmlDoc=xmlDoc {
        var prologue = xmlDoc.root.children[6]["PROLOGUE"]["SPEECH"]
        prologue.children[1].stringValue // Now all the youth of England are on fire,
        prologue.children[2].stringValue // And silken dalliance in the wardrobe lies:
        prologue.children[3].stringValue // Now thrive the armourers, and honour's thought
        prologue.children[4].stringValue // Reigns solely in the breast of every man:
        prologue.children[5].stringValue // They sell the pasture now to buy the horse,
    }
   ```

6. 

   ```swift
    //Find the minimum of an array of Ints
    [10,-22,753,55,137,-1,-279,1034,77].sort().first
    [10,-22,753,55,137,-1,-279,1034,77].reduce(Int.max, combine: min)
    [10,-22,753,55,137,-1,-279,1034,77].minElement()
    //Find the maximum of an array of Ints
    [10,-22,753,55,137,-1,-279,1034,77].sort().last
    [10,-22,753,55,137,-1,-279,1034,77].reduce(Int.min, combine: max)
    [10,-22,753,55,137,-1,-279,1034,77].maxElement()
   ```

7. 

   mapflatMap  

   SwiftGCDhttp://moreindirection.blogspot.it/2015/07/gcd-and-parallel-collections-in-swift.html

8. 

   n

   n	n

   

   ```swift
   var n = 50
   var primes = Set(2...n)

   (2...Int(sqrt(Double(n)))).forEach{primes.subtractInPlace((2*$0).stride(through:n, by:$0))}
   primes.sort()
   ```

    stride(through:Int by:Int)SetSet2n

   Set

   	flatMapSet

   ```swift
   var sameprimes = Set(2...n)

   sameprimes.subtractInPlace((2...Int(sqrt(Double(n))))
   						   .flatMap{ (2*$0).stride(through:n, by:$0)})
   sameprimes.sort()
   ```

   flatMap

9. 

   ```swift
   var a=1, b=2
   (a, b) = (b, a)
   print(a) // 2
   print(b) // 1
   ```

Post.title: Android
Post._content:
### 
| XML     | Java              |            |        |
| :-------- | :----------------- | ------------ | ---------- |
| alph      | AlphaAnimation     |     |        |
| scale     | ScaleAnimation     |    |        |
| translate | TranslateAnimation |  | () |
| rotate    | RotateAnimation    |    |      |

<!-- More -->

### 

|                                  |     |
| ---------------------------------- | ----- |
| accelerate_decelerate_interpolator | - |
| accelerate_interpolator            |     |
| decelerate_interpolator            |     |

### XML

```java
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<set xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" >
    <alpha //
        android:duration="1000" //
        android:fromAlpha="0.0" // 0.0
        android:toAlpha="1.0" /> // 1.0
          
     <scale //
        android:duration="1000" //
        android:fillAfter="false" //true,
        android:fromXScale="0.0" // X 0
        android:fromYScale="0.0" // Y 1
        android:interpolator="@android:anim/accelerate_decelerate_interpolator" //
        android:pivotX="50%" //X,0%~100%50%
        android:pivotY="50%" //Y
        android:toXScale="1.4" // X 1
        android:toYScale="1.4" /> // Y 1
          
     <translate //
        android:duration="2000" //
        android:fromXDelta="30" // X
        android:fromYDelta="30" // Y
        android:toXDelta="-80" // X
        android:toYDelta="300" /> // Y
          
      <rotate
        android:duration="3000" //
        android:fromDegrees="0" // 
        android:interpolator="@android:anim/accelerate_decelerate_interpolator"//
        android:pivotX="50%" //X,0%~100%50%
        android:pivotY="50%" //Y
        android:toDegrees="+350" /> //360
</set>
```

```java
        android:fromYScale="0.0" // Y 1
        android:interpolator="@android:anim/accelerate_decelerate_interpolator" //
        android:pivotX="50%" //X,0%~100%50%
        android:pivotY="50%" //Y
        android:toXScale="1.4" // X 1
        android:toYScale="1.4" /> // Y 1
          
     <translate //
        android:duration="2000" //
        android:fromXDelta="30" // X
        android:fromYDelta="30" // Y
        android:toXDelta="-80" // X
        android:toYDelta="300" /> // Y
          
      <rotate
        android:duration="3000" //
        android:fromDegrees="0" //
```

## AndroidManifest

AndroidManifest

```java
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

<manifest>

    <uses-permission />
    <permission />
    <permission-tree />
    <permission-group />
    <instrumentation />
    <uses-sdk />
    <uses-configuration />  
    <uses-feature />  
    <supports-screens />  
    <compatible-screens />  
    <supports-gl-texture />  

    <application>
  		<meta-data />
        <activity>
            <intent-filter>
                <action />
                <category />
                <data />
            </intent-filter>
            <meta-data />
        </activity>

        <activity-alias>
            <intent-filter> . . . </intent-filter>
            <meta-data />
        </activity-alias>

        <service>
            <intent-filter> . . . </intent-filter>
            <meta-data/>
        </service>

        <receiver>
            <intent-filter> . . . </intent-filter>
            <meta-data />
        </receiver>

        <provider>
            <grant-uri-permission />
            <meta-data />
            <path-permission />
        </provider>

        <uses-library />

    </application>

</manifest>
```

```java
<shape xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" >
    <!-- Radius -->
    <corners
        android:radius="9dp" //
        android:topLeftRadius="2dp" //
        android:topRightRadius="2dp" //
        android:bottomLeftRadius="2dp" //
        android:bottomRightRadius="2dp"/> //

    <!-- angle45(0)type="linear" -->
    <gradient
        android:startColor="@android:color/white"
        android:centerColor="@android:color/black"
        android:endColor="@android:color/black"
        android:useLevel="true"
        android:angle="45"
        android:type="radial"
        android:centerX="0"
        android:centerY="0"
        android:gradientRadius="90"/>

    <!-- -->
    <padding
        android:left="2dp"
        android:top="2dp"
        android:right="2dp"
        android:bottom="2dp"/><!--  -->

    <!-- -->
    <size
        android:width="50dp"
        android:height="50dp"/><!--  -->

    <!--  -->
    <solid
        android:color="@android:color/white"/><!--  -->

    <!--  dashWidthdashGap0dp-->
    <stroke
        android:width="2dp" //
        android:color="@android:color/black" //
        android:dashWidth="1dp" //
        android:dashGap="2dp"/> //
</shape>
```

**xml**

```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout
    xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    app:layout_behavior="@string/appbar_scrolling_view_behavior"
    tools:context="com.shaishavgandhi.fastscrolling.MainActivity"
    tools:showIn="@layout/activity_main">


 <android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView
    android:id="@+id/recyclerView"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    app:fastScrollEnabled="true"
```

Post._content:
[TOC]

### 

kotlin

Kotlin  `List<out T>`  `size``get` Java  `Collection<T>`  `Iterable<T>` list  `MutableList<T>`  `Set<out T>/MutableSet<T>`  `Map<K, out V>/MutableMap<K, V>`

|      |               |
| :--------- | ----------------- |
| Iterable   | MutableIterable   |
| Collection | MutableCollection |
| List       | MutableList       |
| Set        | MutableSet        |
| Map        | MutableMap        |

`List``Set`

```kotlin
val numbers: MutableList<Int> = mutableListOf(1, 2, 3)
val readOnlyView: List<Int> = numbers
println(numbers)        //  "[1, 2, 3]"
numbers.add(4)
println(readOnlyView)   //  "[1, 2, 3, 4]"
readOnlyView.clear()    // -> 

val strings = hashSetOf("a", "b", "c", "c")
assert(strings.size == 3)
```

### 

**any**

`true`

```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.any { it % 2 == 0} // true
list.any { it > 10 } // false
```

**all**

`true`

```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.all { it < 10 } // true
list.all { it % 2 == 0} // false
```

**count**



```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.count { it % 2 == 0 } // 3
```

**fold**



```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.fold(4) { total, next -> total + next } // 4+1+2+3+4+5+6 = 25
list.fold(4) { total, next -> total * next } // 4*1*2*3*4*5*6 = 2880
```

**foldRight**

`fold`

```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.foldRight(4) { total, next -> total + next } // 25
```

**forEach**



```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.forEach { println(it) }
```

**forEachIndexed**

`forEach``index`

```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.forEachIndexed { (index, value) -> println("position $index contains a $value") }
```

**max/min**

/`null`

```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.max() // 6
list.min() // 1
```

**maxBy/minBy**

/`null`

```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.maxBy { -it } // 1
list.minBy { -it } // 6
```

**none**

`true`

```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.none { it % 7 == 0 } // true
```

**reduce**

`fold`

```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.reduce { total, next -> total + next } // 21
```

**reduceRight**

`reduce`

```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.reduceRight { total, next -> total + next } // 21
```

**sum**



```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.sum() // 21
```

**sumBy**



```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.sumBy { it % 2 } // 3
list.sumBy { it + 1 } // 27
```

### 

**drop**

`n`

```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.drop(4) // listOf(5, 6)
```

**dropWhile**



```kotlin
public inline fun <T> Iterable<T>.dropWhile(predicate: (T) -> Boolean): List<T> {
    var yielding = false
    val list = ArrayList<T>()
    for (item in this)
        if (yielding)
            list.add(item)
        else if (!predicate(item)) {
            list.add(item)
            yielding = true
        }
    return list
}
```
`dropWhile``predicate``list`

```kotlin
val list1 = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list1.dropWhile { it < 3 } // listOf(3, 4, 5, 6)
```

3`{it < 3}``3`33`3`

`6`

```kotlin
val list2 = listOf(6, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
list2.dropWhile { it < 3} // listOf(6, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
```

`6``{it < 3}``6`

**dropLastWhile**



```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.dropLastWhile { it > 4 } // listOf(1, 2, 3, 4)
```

**filter**



```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.filter { it % 2 == 0 } // listOf(2, 4, 6)
list.filter { it < 3 } // listOf(1, 2)
```

**filterNot**



```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.filterNot { it % 2 == 0} // listOf(1, 3, 5)
```

**filterNotNull**

`null`

```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, null)
println(list.filterNotNull()) // listOf[1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
```

**slice**



```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.slice(0..3) // listOf(1, 2, 3, 4)
list.slice(listOf(1, 3, 4)) // listOf(2, 4, 5)
```

> `(0..3)`03
>
> `listOf(1, 3, 4)`134

**take**

n(n)

```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.take(2) // listOf[1, 2]
```

**takeLast**

n(n)

```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.take(2) // listOf[5, 6]
```

**takeWhile**



```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.takeWhile { it < 3 } // listOf[1, 2]
```

### 

**flatMap**



`list``list``list`

```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.flatMap { listOf('a' + it) } // listOf(b, c, d, e, f, g)
```

`listOf('a'+ it)`list66list`(listOf(b)listOf(c)listOf(d)listOf(e)listOf(f)listOf(g))`6`list`6`list``list``listOf('a' + it)`

```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.flatMap { listOf(it, 'a' + it) } // listOf(1, b, 2, c, 3, d, 4, e, 5, f, 6, g)
```

**groupBy**

map`key``value`

```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
//  mapOf("odd" to listOf(1, 3, 5), "even" to listOf(2, 4, 6)}
list.groupBy { if (it % 2 ==0) "even" else "odd" } 
```

**map**

List()

2

```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.map { it * 2 } // listOf(2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12)
```



```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.map { 'a' + it } // listOf(b, c, d, e, f, g)
```

**mapIndexed**

`map``index`

```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
list.mapIndexed { index, it -> index + it } // listOf(1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 11)
```

**mapNotNull**

`map``null`

```kotlin
class Person(val name: String? = null)
val list = listOf(Person(), Person("Alice"))
// map
list.map { it.name } // listOf(null, "Alice")
// mapNotNull
list.mapNotNull { it.name } // listOf("Alice")
```

**contains**

```kotlin
public fun <T, R> Iterable<Pair<T, R>>.unzip(): Pair<List<T>, List<R>> {
    val expectedSize = collectionSizeOrDefault(10)
    val listT = ArrayList<T>(expectedSize)
    val listR = ArrayList<R>(expectedSize)
    for (pair in this) {
        listT.add(pair.first)
        listR.add(pair.second)
    }
    return listT to listR
}
```

```kotlin
public inline fun <T> Iterable<T>.dropWhile(predicate: (T) -> Boolean): List<T> {
    var yielding = false
    val list = ArrayList<T>()
    for (item in this)
        if (yielding)
            list.add(item)
        else if (!predicate(item)) {
            list.add(item)
            yielding = true
        }
    return list
}
```

Post.title: Kotlin
Post._content:
### 

#### 

|    |        |
| -------- | -------------- |
| +a       | a.unaryPlus()  |
| -a       | a.unaryMinus() |
| !a       | a.not()        |
| ++a, a++ | a.inc()        |
| --a, a-- | a.dec()        |

<!--more-->



```kotlin
data class Point(val x: Int, val y: Int)
operator fun Point.unaryMinus() = Point(-x, -y)
operator fun Point.inc() = Point(x + 1, y + 1)
var p = Point(10, 20)
println(-p) // Point(x=10, y=-20)
println(++p) // Point(x=11, y=21)
```

#### 

|  |                  |
| ------ | ------------------------ |
| a + b  | a.plus(b)                |
| a - b  | a.minus(b)               |
| a * b  | a.times(b)               |
| a / b  | a.div(b)                 |
| a % b  | a.rem(b)a.mod(b)() |
| a..b   | a.rangeTo(b)             |



```kotlin
data class Point(val x: Int, val y: Int) {
    operator fun plus(other: Point): Point {
        return Point(x + other.x, y + other.y)
    }
}
val p1 = Point(10, 20)
val p2 = Point(30, 40)
println(p1 + p2) // Point(x=40, y=60)
```

#### 

- shl  
- shr  
- ushr  
- and  
- or  
- xor  
- inv  



```kotlin
// kotlin
val num = 1 shl 4
println(num) // 16
==>
// java
int num = 1 << 4
```

#### in

|   |        |
| ------- | -------------- |
| a in b  | b.contains(a)  |
| a !in b | !b.contains(a) |



```kotlin
data class Rectangle(val upperLeft: Point, val lowerRight: Point)
operator fun Rectangle.contains(p: Point): Boolean {
    return p.x in upperLeft.x until lowerRight.x &&
    	p.y in upperLeft.y until lowerRight.y
}
val rect = Rectangle(Point(10, 20), Point(50, 50))
println(Point(20, 30) in rect) // true
```

#### (`get`  `set`)

|                |                 |
| -------------------- | ----------------------- |
| a[i]                 | a.get(i)                |
| a[i, j]              | a.get(i, j)             |
| a[i_1, , i-n]       | a.get( i_1, ..., i_n)   |
| a[i] = b             | a.set(i, b)             |
| a[i, j] = b          | a.set(i, j, b)          |
| a[i_1, ..., i_n] = b | a.set(i_1, ..., i_n, b) |



```kotlin
// 
operator fun Point.get(index: Int): Int {
    return when(index) {
        0 -> x
        1 -> y
        else -> throw IndexOutOfBoundsException("Invalid coordinate $index")
    }
}

val p = Point(10, 20)
println(p[1]) // 20

// 
data class MutablePoint(var x: Int, var y: Int)
operator fun MutablePoint.set(index: Int, value: Int) {
    when(index) {
        0 -> x = value
        1 -> y = value
        else -> 
        	throw IndexOutOfBoundsException("Invalid coordinate $index")
    }
}
val p = MutablePoint(10, 20)
p[1] = 42
println(p) // MutablePoint(x=10, y=42)
```

#### (invoke)

|          |               |
| -------------- | --------------------- |
| a()            | a.invoke()            |
| a(i)           | a.invoke(i)           |
| a(i, j)        | a.invoke(i, j)        |
| a(i_i, , i_n) | a.invoke(i_1, , i_n) |

 `invoke`



```kotlin
class Greeter(val greeting: String) {
    operator fun invoke(name: String) {
        println("$greeting, $name!")
    }
}

val bavarianGreeter = Greeter("Servus") 
bavarianGreeter("Dmitry") // Servus, Dmitry!
==>
val bavarianGreeter = Greeter("Servus")("Dmitry") // Servus, Dmitry!
```

`invoke`

```kotlin
object Any {
	operator fun invoke(name: String): String {
		return name
	}
	
	operator fun invoke(number: Int): Int {
```

### 

#### rangeTo

`..``rangeTo``in``in` 

```
start..end -> start.rangeTo(end)
```

`IntRange` `LongRange` `CharRange`  Java  *for*-

<!--more-->

#### in()

```kotlin
// 1..5  [1,5]
if (i in 1..5) ==> if (i >= 1 && i <=5)
if (i !in 1..5) ==> if (i <= 1 && i >=5)
```

#### downTo

```kotlin
// 
for (i in 1..5) 

// 
for (i in 5..1) // 
==>
for (i in 5 downTo 1)
```

#### step

```kotlin
// 
for (i in 1..5 step 2) ==> for (i = 1; i<=5 ; i+=2)
//
for (i in downTo 5 step 2) ==> for (i = 5;i >= 1;i-=2)
```

#### until()

```kotlin
// 1 until 5  [1,5)
for (i in 1 until 5) println(i)
// 1234
```

#### reversed

```kotlin
val list = listOf(1, 2, 3)
println(list.reversed()) // [3, 2, 1]
```

#### last

 `last`  `last`  `(last - first) % step == 0` 

```kotlin
(1..12 step 2).last == 11  //  [1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 11] 
(1..12 step 3).last == 10  //  [1, 4, 7, 10] 
(1..12 step 4).last == 9   //  [1, 5, 9] 
```

### 



```kotlin
class Point(var x: Int, var y: Int) {
	fun getPointX(): Int {
		return x
	}

	fun printPointY() {
		println(y)
	}
}

// ::

val getY = Point::printPointY

getY.invoke(Point(3, 4))

print(getX.invoke(Point(2, 3)))
```

`::`

```kotlin

```

 `::isOdd`  `(Int) -> Boolean` 

`::`

```kotlin

fun isOdd(s: String) = s == "brillig" || s == "slithy" || s == "tove"

println(numbers.filter(::isOdd)) // refers to isOdd(x: Int)
```




### 



```kotlin
fun <A, B, C> compose(f: (B) -> C, g: (A) -> B): (A) -> C {
    return { x -> f(g(x)) }
}
```

`compose(f, g) = f(g(*))`

```kotlin
fun length(s: String) = s.length

val oddLength = compose(::isOdd, ::length)
val strings = listOf("a", "ab", "abc")

println(strings.filter(oddLength)) // Prints "[a, abc]"
```

```kotlin
}
```

```kotlin
println(numberRegex.matches("29")) // prints "true"
 
val isNumber = numberRegex::matches
println(isNumber("29")) // prints "true"

val strings = listOf("abc", "124", "a70")
println(strings.filter(numberRegex::matches)) // [124]
```



```kotlin
val isNumber: (CharSequence) -> Boolean = numberRegex::matches
val matches: (Regex, CharSequence) -> Boolean = Regex::matches
```

:

```kotlin
val prop = "abc"::length
println(prop.get())   // prints "3"
```

Post.title: react-native-text
Post._content:
### Text

React

`Text`

### Props

---
accessible bool

When set to true, indicates that the view is an accessibility element. The default value for a Text element is true.


See the Accessibility guide for more information.
---

ellipsizeMode enum('head', 'middle', 'tail', 'clip')

This can be one of the following values:

head - The line is displayed so that the end fits in the container and the missing text at the beginning of the line is indicated by an ellipsis glyph. e.g., "...wxyz"
middle - The line is displayed so that the beginning and end fit in the container and the missing text in the middle is indicated by an ellipsis glyph. "ab...yz"
tail - The line is displayed so that the beginning fits in the container and the missing text at the end of the line is indicated by an ellipsis glyph. e.g., "abcd..."
clip - Lines are not drawn past the edge of the text container.
The default is tail.

numberOfLines must be set in conjunction with this prop.

clip is working only for iOS
numberOfLines number

Used to truncate the text with an ellipsis after computing the text layout, including line wrapping, such that the total number of lines does not exceed this number.

This prop is commonly used with ellipsizeMode.

onLayout function

Invoked on mount and layout changes with

{nativeEvent: {layout: {x, y, width, height}}}

onLongPress function

This function is called on long press.

e.g., `onLongPress={this.increaseSize}>``

onPress function

This function is called on press.

e.g., `onPress={() => console.log('1st')}``

### 

[+ShadowsocksX](/2018/02/26/study/study-bwh-ssr/)```shadowsocks`

: [SSH(Termius)](/2018/01/30/study/study-centos-ssh/)

<!-- More -->

### shadowsocks

python:https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks/tree/master

`CentOS`:

#### Git

shadowsocks`git`

**CentOS**

```python
yum install -y git
```

**Debian / Ubuntu**

```python
apt-get install -y git
```

#### shadowsocks

**CentOS**

```python
yum install python-setuptools && easy_install pip
pip install git+https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks.git@master
```

**Debian / Ubuntu**

```python
apt-get install python-pip
pip install git+https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks.git@master
```

 https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks/wiki/Configuration-via-Config-File



****`shadowsocks.json`

```python
vi /etc/shadowsocks.json
```

****`i``i` `INSERT`()

****

```python
{
    "server":"my_server_ip",
    "server_port":8388,
    "local_address": "127.0.0.1",
    "local_port":1080,
    "password":"mypassword",
    "timeout":300,
    "method":"rc4-md5",
    "fast_open": false
}
```

> `my_server_ip `
>
> 8388(8388)
>
> `mypassword`

****

```python
{
    "server":"my_server_ip",
    "local_address":"127.0.0.1",
    "local_port":1080,
    "port_password":{
    	"1":"1",
    	"2":"2",
    	"3":"3"
    },
    "timeout":600,
    "method":"rc4-md5",
  	"fast_open": false
}
```

> `my_server_ip `
>
> `11`'8388':"123456"

****`method``aes-256-cfb``rc4-md5``rc4-md5`



`ESC``:wq`

****





```python
ssserver -c /etc/shadowsocks.json -d start
```



```python
ssserver -c /etc/shadowsocks.json -d stop
```

****

```
vi /etc/rc.local
```

`rc.local`

```
sudo ssserver -c /etc/shadowsocks.json -d start
```



(^^)

Post.title: CentOS7GitLab
Post._content:
### GitLab

https://about.gitlab.com/installation/

`CentOS 7`

**1.**

```python
sudo yum install -y curl policycoreutils-python openssh-server 
sudo systemctl enable sshd 
sudo systemctl start sshd sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --add-service=http 
sudo systemctl reload firewalld 
```

`Postfix`

```python
sudo yum install postfix 
sudo systemctl enable postfix 
sudo systemctl start postfix 
```

**2.GitLab**

`GitLab`

```python
curl https://packages.gitlab.com/install/repositories/gitlab/gitlab-ee/script.rpm.sh | sudo bash 
```

`GitLab``http://gitlab.example.com``GitLab`

`http://100.10.10.10`

```python
sudo EXTERNAL_URL="http://gitlab.example.com" yum install -y gitlab-ee 
```

**3.**

```python
gitlab-ctl reconfigure
```

**4.**

```python
gitlab-ctl start
```

**5.**

http://

CentOS7firewalld(`systemctl stop firewalld`)

```python
					502
Whoops, GitLab is taking too much time to respond.
```
